bio.first: I build stuffs for the web.
bio.second: I am Delhi-based software engineer who is specialised in building exceptional digital experiences.
bio.third: MERN stack developer, designer(occasionally) and content creator

allprojects.title: Netflix Clone
allprojects.description: Netflix clone with sign-in/sign-up functionality where all movie datasets are being fetched through TMDB API calls

allprojects.title: Tinder Clone
allprojects.description: Tinder clone with swipe functionality of image which can be extended to real time chatting with that person, focused more on UI design

allprojects.title: Weather App
allprojects.description: Simple weather application with minimal, decent and clean UI using Open Weather API with graphical representation of weather forecasting
